author: Joanna Stern
title: Old Laptop, Tablet or Phone? Here’s How They Can Help You Right Now - The Wall Street Journal
description: Thanks to the Great Stay-at-Home Experiment of 2020, gadgets are backordered, but there’s plenty you can do with your old ones
content:
Calling all Marie Kondo defiers! Yes, you, who fought the good fight and refused to part with that crusty, dusty 9,000-pound laptop in your basement that we both know sparks absolutely no joy.
Fellow gadget hoarders, now is our time.
In the past week, Ive t… [+91 chars]
